Information: Nitrus oxide emission factor for wastewater treatment as a function of total nitrogen.
Notes:
| See V5, C6, Equation 6.10 and Equation 6.13 for industrial wastewater and Table 6.8A (2019R) for emission factors for industrial and domestic wastwater
 | 
 | For primary treatment category, use default emission factor (see 6A.4)

Variable: Fraction of Nitrogen Removed in Treatment
Information: Wastewater treatment removes some fraction of nitrogen, similar to the methane correction factor. See V5, C6, Equation 6.8 and Tables 6.10B and 6.10C.
Notes: | See V5, C6, Table 6.10C (2019R) for default removal fractions by type

Variable: Fraction of Phosphorous Removed in Treatment
Notes:
| See Table 7 in `IADB Report on Urban Wastewater Treatment in Brazil <https://publications.iadb.org/publications/english/document/Urban-Wastewater-Treatment-in-Brazil.pdf>`_ for more information on phosphorous removal by different plant types.
 | 
 | **NOTE:** default factors of 0.35 are used for most water treatment plants (<0.35 is specified in Table 7). Advanced plants are treated as the conceptual mean of "Anaerobic pond + facult. pond + maturation pond", "UASB + dissolved-air flotation", and "UASB + maturation ponds", which have values of >0.5, 75-88, and >0.5. Using nominal values of 0.5, 0.5, and 81.5, this gives a mean 0.605.

Variable: Fraction of Total Organic Waste Removed in Treatment
Notes:
| See V5, C6, Equation 6.3D (2019R) for total oranics in domestic wastewater effluent
 | 
 | See Table 6.6B for removal fractions by treatment type
See Table 6.3 in IPCC Guidelines for NGHG Inventories

Information: Nitrus oxide emissions from protein content in wastewater.
Nitrus oxide emissions from treatment processes.

Variable: Total BOD Organic Waste in Effluent
Information: Total organic waste in effluent released from different pathways from BOD
Total BOD treated by wastewater treatment type

Variable: Total COD Organic Waste in Effluent
Information: Total organic waste in effluent released from different pathways from BOD
Total COD treated by wastewater treatment type
